name: What I Lost That Day
description:
You lost something precious to you.

Will you ever find it again?

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

C - interact / progress dialogue

Thank you for playing!

KNOWN BUGS:

  • Talking to Sen after talking to Bera causes the game to become unresponsive.
  • Interacting with the dresser after talking to Bera causes the game to become unresponsive.

I apologize for any inconvenience these bugs may cause!

Independently developed by Sean.

Submission to UMBC + UMD + AACC Fall Jam 2020 with the theme "Deprivation."

Royalty free music from bensound.com  :^)
